name.zh_CN: 魔法葫芦 - 批注网页、PDF、Bilibili、YouTube
name.zh_TW: 魔法葫蘆 - 批註網頁、PDF、YouTube、Bilibili

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Annotate Anything: Add text or image highlights, notes, and tags to webpages, PDFs, YouTube, and Bilibili -- all in one place!
short.zh_CN: 批注万物：在网页、PDF、Bilibili 和 YouTube 上添加文字或图片高亮、笔记和标签，一站式搞定！
short.zh_TW: 批註萬物：在網頁、PDF、YouTube 和 Bilibili 上添加文字或圖片高亮、筆記和標籤，一站式搞定！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you encounter something that sparks a thought during your daily browsing, a simple click is all it takes to capture it.

Magic Gourd is designed to perfectly support the “Sparked Learning Method,” allowing you to annotate any webpage or PDF, highlight text, images, and even video frames(YouTube & Bilibili), with options for tags and color settings. Focused, efficient, and delightful.

A spark is the flash of an idea. Magic Gourd quietly preserves these sparks, ready to present them whenever you need. Each captured moment is support for the future.

A spark is also an anchor for memory. Magic Gourd loads your annotations for each page, helping you reconnect with the original content as if conversing with the author. It anchors memories and bridges connections.

Your sparks are your personal intellectual wealth. Magic Gourd employs local encryption, with only encrypted data stored in the backend database, ensuring that all your data remains exclusively yours.

A spark is a magical tool at your fingertips; recording it makes the magic appear. Although Magic Gourd is developed by a small team, cost control and reserved funds ensure stable operation for at least 10 years. We hope this number is forever, and we will explore additional paid features to build a sustainable business model.

Key Features:
✅ Annotate any webpage and online PDFs
✅ Highlight text, images, and video frames (YouTube & Bilibili)
✅ Offers unlimited tags, color, and categorization options
✅ Export highlighted cards and Markdown notes
✅ “Read Later” functionality for marking as unread
✅ Browse history review, quick search, categorization, filtering, and sorting
✅ Multi-browser syncing to ensure data security
✅ Offline annotation mode with automatic cloud syncing when online
✅ Local encryption to ensure your data remains fully private

Official Website: https://www.magic-gourd.site/
User Guide: https://www.yuque.com/yuqueyonghu4j1trj/magic-gourd/gu6qpetgyzvbyocm

Keep recording, and the magic will unfold.
long.zh_CN:
日常浏览时遇到触动你的点，轻轻一点，即可收集。

魔法葫芦旨在完美支持‘触动学习法’，支持任意网页和PDF的批注记录，支持图片、高亮、视频帧高亮（YouTube & Bilibili），支持标签和颜色设置。专注、高效、愉悦。

触动是思维的火花。魔法葫芦会安静地保管这些火花，在你需要时随时为你呈现。每一次收集，都是增援未来。

触动是记忆的锚点。魔法葫芦为每个页面载入历史批注，就像你和原文作者恢复对话。是记忆的锚点，也是情感的连接。

触动是独属于你的精神财富。魔法葫芦采用了本地加密技术，后端数据库仅存储密文，确保所有数据独属于你。

触动是随手可得的魔法，坚持记录便能显现。魔法葫芦虽由小团队开发，但通过成本控制和资金预留，确保至少 10 年的稳定运营。我们希望这个数字是永远，未来会探索增量的付费功能，构建可持续的商业模式。


主要功能：
✅ 支持任意网页和在线 PDF 批注
✅ 支持文本、图片和视频帧（YouTube & Bilibili）高亮
✅ 提供标签、颜色和分类设置，数量无限制
✅ 可导出高亮卡片和 Markdown 笔记
✅ 支持稍后阅读（标记未读）功能
✅ 提供历史记录回顾、快捷搜索、分类查询、过滤和排序功能
✅ 多浏览器间同步，保障数据安全
✅ 支持离线批注模式，联网后自动同步到云端
✅ 本地加密保护，确保数据完全私有

官方网址：https://www.magic-gourd.site/
帮助文档：https://www.yuque.com/yuqueyonghu4j1trj/magic-gourd/gu6qpetgyzvbyocm

坚持记录，魔法自然显现。
